title: Define checkpoint.schema.json
description: Create the JSON schema for checkpoint metadata. Defines structure for checkpoint ID, task ID, timestamp, type (pre-execution/mid-execution/manual), description, files array with paths/hashes/backup paths, and task state snapshot.
notes: Created checkpoint.schema.json defining checkpoint metadata structure. Schema includes checkpoint_id (chk-{task_id}-{sequence} pattern), task_id, timestamp, type (pre-execution/mid-execution/manual), description, files array (path/hash/backup_path/existed), and task_state snapshot. Enables versioned state capture and restoration.
